title: VIDEO: Chelsea loanee Nicolas Jackson goes viral after sharing bizarre clip of himself walking topless in the snow in Munich
desc: Nicolas Jackson has gone viral on social media after the Bayern Munich loanee shared a video of himself walking through snow in the German city. The 24-year-old, who joined Chelsea in 2023, has scored five goals in 22 appearances for the Bundesliga giants this season, largely being reduced to a back-up role behind star striker Harry Kane.
